channel.title: Iron on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Iron on funPlantGenes

item.title: AhDMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AhDMT1 Gene Name: Divalent Metal Transporter 1 Genome: Species: Arachis hypogaea Functional Descriptions: AhDMT1, a Fe2+ transporter, is involved in improving iron nutrition and N2 fixation in nodules of peanut intercropped with maize in calcareous soils.

item.title: AhFRDL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AhFRDL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Arachis hypogaea Functional Descriptions: AhFRDL1-mediated citrate secretion contributes to adaptation to iron deficiency and aluminum stress in peanuts.

item.title: AhNRAMP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AhNRAMP1 Gene Name: natural resistance-associated macrophage protein 1 Genome: Species: Arachis hypogaea Functional Descriptions: AhNRAMP1 iron transporter is involved in iron acquisition in peanut.

item.title: CSN6
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os08g39070 RAPdb gene ID: Os08g0500000 Gene Symbol: CSN6 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: D27
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os11g37650 RAPdb gene ID: None Gene Symbol: D27 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: ENOD93
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.06G216500 Gene Symbol: ENOD93 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Ethylene Response Factor Required for Nodulation (ERN1/ERN2), Nuclear Factor-Y Subunit A1 (NF-YA1), Nodule Inception (NIN), and downstream nodulation genes(ENOD40 and ENOD93).

item.title: GmbHLH57
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.12G178500 Gene Symbol: GmbHLH57 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The expression of GmbHLH57 and GmbHLH300, two Fe-related genes expressed in nodules of Gmysl7 mutants.

item.title: GmFAD7-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmFAD7-1 Gene Name: omega-3 fatty acid desaturase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Genomic sequencing analysis together with searches at the soybean genome database further confirmed that both GmFAD7 genes were located in two different loci within the soybean genome, suggesting that the soybean ω3 plastidial desaturase FAD7 is encoded by two different paralogous genes.

item.title: GmFAD7-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmFAD7-2 Gene Name: omega-3 fatty acid desaturase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Genomic sequencing analysis together with searches at the soybean genome database further confirmed that both GmFAD7 genes were located in two different loci within the soybean genome, suggesting that the soybean ω3 plastidial desaturase FAD7 is encoded by two different paralogous genes.

item.title: GmLba
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.20G191200 Gene Symbol: GmLba Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmbHLH300 mediates response to iron deficiency in nodule by regulating the expression of ENOD93 and GmLba.

item.title: GmRPA3a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma19g38100 Gene Symbol: GmRPA3a Gene Name: Replication Protein A subunit 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Replication protein A subunit 3 and the iron efficiency response in soybean.

item.title: GmRPA3b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma03g35460 Gene Symbol: GmRPA3b Gene Name: Replication Protein A subunit 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Replication protein A subunit 3 and the iron efficiency response in soybean.

item.title: GmRPA3c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma20g24590 Gene Symbol: GmRPA3c Gene Name: Replication Protein A subunit 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Replication protein A subunit 3 and the iron efficiency response in soybean.

item.title: GmRPA3d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma10g42530 Gene Symbol: GmRPA3d Gene Name: Replication Protein A subunit 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Replication protein A subunit 3 and the iron efficiency response in soybean.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.07g207200 Gene Symbol: GmSACPD-A Gene Name: stearoyl-acyl carrier protein desaturase Genome: W82.

item.title: GmVTL1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.05G121600 Gene Symbol: GmVTL1a Gene Name: vacuolar iron transporter like 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmVTL1a is an iron transporter on the symbiosome membrane of soybean with an important role in nitrogen fixation.

item.title: GmVTL1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G076300 Gene Symbol: GmVTL1b Gene Name: vacuolar iron transporter like 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmVTL1a and GmVTL1b are specifically expressed in the fixation zone of soybean nodules.

item.title: GmYSL7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.11G203400 Gene Symbol: GmYSL7 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmYSL7 controls iron uptake, allocation, and cellular response of nodules in soybean.

item.title: Gpc-B1;NAM-B1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS6B02G207500LC Gene Symbol: Gpc-B1 NAM-B1 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: HvYS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvYS1 Gene Name: iron–phytosiderophore transporter Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: We identified a gene specifically encoding an iron–phytosiderophore transporter (HvYS1) in barley, which is the most tolerant species to iron deficiency among graminaceous plants.

item.title: HvYS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvYS2 Gene Name: Putative iron-phytosiderophore transporter Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Here, we report the cloning and characterization of HvYSL2, a novel metal–PS transporter encoding gene.

item.title: IbVP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbVP1 Gene Name: H+-pyrophosphatase 1 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: H+-pyrophosphatase IbVP1 promotes efficient iron use in sweet potato.

item.title: IDEF1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os08g01090 RAPdb gene ID: Os08g0101000 Gene Symbol: IDEF1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: IDEF2
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os05g35170 RAPdb gene ID: Os05g0426200 Gene Symbol: IDEF2 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: LeFRO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeFRO1 Gene Name: ferric-chelate reductase1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeFRO1 encoding an Fe(III)-chelate reductase protein was isolated from the tomato genome.

item.title: LeIRT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeIRT1 Gene Name: iron-regulated transporter 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeFRO1 encoding an Fe(III)-chelate reductase protein was isolated from the tomato genome.

item.title: LeIRT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeIRT2 Gene Name: iron-regulated transporter 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: To extend our molecular knowledge of Fe transport in crop plants, we have isolated two cDNAs (LeIRT1 and LeIRT2) from a library constructed from roots of iron-deficient tomato (Solanum lycopersicum) plants, using the Arabidopsis iron transporter cDNA, IRT1, as a probe.

item.title: LjMATE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjMATE1 Gene Name: multidrug and toxic compound extrusion (MATE) protein1 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: LjMATE1: A Citrate Transporter Responsible for Iron Supply to the Nodule Infection Zone of Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjPCS3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjPCS3 Gene Name: phytochelatin synthase PCS3-7N Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: Functional Characterization of an Unusual Phytochelatin Synthase, LjPCS3, of Lotus japonicus.

item.title: MdbHLH104
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000825749 Gene Symbol: MdbHLH104 Gene Name: basic helix-loop-helix transcription factor 104 Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MsLEA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MS.gene058705 Gene Symbol: MsLEA1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: These results indicate that MsLEA1 recruits and protects its target proteins (SOD and Ms1770) and increases alfalfa tolerance against drought and Al stresses.

item.title: MtCIPK12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr8g086380 Gene Symbol: MtCIPK12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Protein kinase MtCIPK12 modulates iron reduction in Medicago truncatula by regulating riboflavin biosynthesis.

item.title: MtYSL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr3g092090 Gene Symbol: MtYSL3 Gene Name: Medicago truncatula Yellow Stripe1-Like3 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: MtYSL3 is a plasma membrane protein expressed by vascular cells in roots and nodules and by cortical nodule cells.

item.title: MxMPK6-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MxMPK6-2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus xiaojinensis Functional Descriptions: MxMPK6-2-bHLH104 interaction is involved in reactive oxygen species signaling in response to iron deficiency in apple rootstock.
